interestsHTML:
Of passionate nature I spend my time trying to learn and understand more precisely every detail of the subjects that interest me, especially in literature, art and computer science.
That's why I like to acquire new knowledge in different fields ranging from development to sociology or psychology.

I keep myself informed on documentation watch via blogs/forums, social networks, podcasts and specialized sites.


Outside of activities related to information and documentation, I like to hike in parks or play sports. Otherwise, I like to challenge myself and learn online. I also enjoy writing and directing videos as well as editing and drawing on a graphics tablet when I'm not traveling to cultural events.
